snippet: Staples employees tell the Haggler about sales incentives that they say make it unpleasant for them to sell computers without accessories like service plans.
abstract: David Segal The Haggler column features Staples employees talking about sales incentives that they say make it unpleasant for them to sell computers without accessories like service plans.
lead_paragraph: Staples employees tell the Haggler about sales incentives that they say make it unpleasant for them to sell computers without accessories like service plans.

headline.print_headline: Selling It With Extras, Or Not at All
headline.seo: Sales Incentives at Staples Draw Complaints — The Haggler
headline.main: Selling It With Extras, or Not at All
